translations: v.压制褶子于……；用长笛吹奏（flute 的第三人称单数）

sentences.sentence: The melody is then taken up by the flutes.
He shows off a copy of the scores used by the musicians whose flutes, cymbals, drums and pipes accompanied the Boxers into combat.
sentences.translation: 他拿出一本乐谱炫耀，当年乐师就是照着这本乐谱，拿着长笛、铙钹、鼓、风笛演奏，与义和团并肩作战。
